quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issued_shares_note: The number of issued shares has been adjusted for the announced rights issue of 3 rights shares for every 8 existing shares with an ex-date of 2 September 2025. The number of issued shares before the adjustment is 73,265,237 shares as at 31 August 2025.
quote.summary: China Information Technology Development Limited is a Hong Kong-based investment holding company principally engaged in the information technology (IT) related businesses. The Company mainly operates through two business segments. The Software Development and System Integration segment is mainly engaged in the sales of computer hardware and the provision of software development, system integration, as well as technical support and maintenance services. The In-house Developed Products segment is mainly engaged in the leasing of in-house developed computer hardware. The Company mainly conducts its businesses in Hong Kong, the Peopleâ€™s Republic of China (the PRC) and the United States of America (the USA). The Company is also involved in the office management business through its subsidiaries.
